name: Escape the Catacombs (Juliana Soranno, Taneim, apoorvak)
name_original: Escape the Catacombs (Juliana Soranno, Taneim, apoorvak)
description:
A game made for NYU's Game Design course in Spring 2023. 

The central premise for this game was "Level Design".

Hope you enjoy this game!

Lore

Cats are prone to getting in trouble, especially ones who enjoy casual thievery. Sick of your antics, the Witches set up a trap that you inevitably fall for. They throw you in a cell beneath the catacombs so they can live out the rest of their years without you stealing from them. You, a quick-witted cat, notice a stray key lying around your cell. How many things can you steal without the witches knowing? And with you making it out in one piece?
